capabilities.name: create_entities
capabilities.description: Create multiple new entities in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: create_relations
capabilities.description: Create multiple new relations between entities in the knowledge graph. Relations should be in active voice

capabilities.name: add_observations
capabilities.description: Add new observations to existing entities in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_entities
capabilities.description: Delete multiple entities and their associated relations from the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_observations
capabilities.description: Delete specific observations from entities in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_relations
capabilities.description: Delete multiple relations from the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: read_graph
capabilities.description: Read the entire knowledge graph

capabilities.name: search_nodes
capabilities.description: Search for nodes in the knowledge graph based on a query

capabilities.name: open_nodes
capabilities.description: Open specific nodes in the knowledge graph by their names

capabilities.name: update_entities
capabilities.description: Update multiple existing entities in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: update_relations
capabilities.description: Update multiple existing relations in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: think
capabilities.description: Use the tool to think about something. It will not obtain new information or change the database, but just append the thought to the log. Use it when complex reasoning or some cache memory is needed. Consider including: problem definition, relevant context, analysis steps, self-reflection on your reasoning, and conclusions. Adapt this structure as needed for your specific thought process.

capabilities.name: plan_tasks
capabilities.description: Create multiple tasks from a plan. Generates IDs and syncs with knowledge graph.

capabilities.name: list_tasks
capabilities.description: List tasks with optional filtering by status and priority.

capabilities.name: next_task
capabilities.description: Get the next highest priority todo task and mark it as in-progress.

capabilities.name: complete_task
capabilities.description: Mark a task as completed.

capabilities.name: update_tasks
capabilities.description: Update multiple tasks with new values.

capabilities.name: show_memory_path
capabilities.description: Return absolute path of the active knowledge-graph file.

capabilities.name: exa_search
capabilities.description: Search the web using Exa API

capabilities.name: exa_answer
capabilities.description: Ask a question and get a sourced answer via Exa /answer API.
